p: The DPP4 protein structure (4PV7) [ 43] and the structure of the complex formed by the MERS-CoV S receptor binding domain bound to DPP4 (4L72) [ 16] were retrieved from the Research Collaboratory for Structural Bioinformatics Protein Database (RSCB PDB, https://www.rcsb.org/). Structure visualization and colorization was performed using the YASARA software ( http://www.yasara.org/index.html) [ 44] and UCSF Chimera version 1.14 (developed by the Resource for Biocomputing, Visualization, and Informatics at the University of California, San Francisco) [ 45].
